field.name: summary
field.value: AspView: single quotes in aspview/properties script tag not recognized

field.name: description
field.value:
This version correctly creates the properties. <script runat="server" type="aspview/properties"> int SomeProperty; ... </script>
This one does not (notice the single quotes ' instead of double quotes") <script runat='server' type='aspview/properties'> int SomeProperty; ... </script>
XML allows both single and double quotes, it should be supported by AspVIew as well.
